AI, data and tech 
AI and the tech you need to stay ahead of change 
  * Explore
  * Editor's picks[410]
  * Highlights[411]
  * PwC x TED[412]
  * Get in touch[413]


  * javascript:void; - More


Explore
  * Editor's picks[414]
  * Highlights[415]
  * PwC x TED[416]
  * Get in touch[417]


Everyday, tech is enabling new ways to learn, work, create, innovate and engage. And yet it's changing so quickly, it's hard to keep pace. How do you know which platform is right for you? How can your data work harder, and how can you power your potential with AI? At PwC we'll help you find the right tech, for the right journey- bringing innovation, insight and hands on implementation to help you achieve real results. 
Discover our latest thinking on the technologies that are reshaping tomorrow- from how AI is redefining strategy, to how agents are reimagining the way we work.
> About half of CEOs expect GenAI to increase the profitability of their company over the next 12 months. 
> PwC’s 28th Annual Global CEO Survey

3 Min Read 23/01/25 An AI trust gap may be holding CEOs back  Results from PwC’s most recent CEO Survey show that executives have big expectations from AI. To realise them, they’ll need to build more confidence in the tech.  [418]3 Min Read 09/01/25 Climate tech’s future may be AI-powered  Start-ups focused on AI-enabled solutions have seen a significant bump in investment. That’s an opportunity for the C-suite.  [419]8 Min Read 27/01/25 In the age of AI: Speed matters more, scale matters less, innovation matters most  Discover how your business can use AI to reshape business strategy, workforce and technology to drive success and gain a competitive edge.
